snippet: An association trying to defuse violence among young people tries to shake off its own troubled reputation.
abstract: An association trying to defuse violence among young people tries to shake off its own troubled reputation.
lead_paragraph: Juan Jiménez was making good time on his way to a friend's place in Harlem, until a police officer stopped him at a subway station in the Bronx. Where was he going? Did he just jump a turnstile? Could he show some identification?

headline.main: Seeking Calm in Themselves and on the Street
